abstract: Federal Judge Nanette K Laughrey blocks Missouri's state health department from revoking abortion license of Columbia-based clinic Planned Parenthood of Kansas and mid-Missouri; rules revocation was overly harsh and politically motivated.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge said the state had treated the Planned Parenthood clinic more harshly than similar institutions and had moved to withdraw the license because of political pressure from some state lawmakers.

headline.main: Missouri: Judge Prevents State From Revoking Abortion License
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Judge Prevents State From Revoking Abortion License

snippet: A federal judge said the state had treated the Planned Parenthood clinic more harshly than similar institutions and had moved to withdraw the license because of political pressure from some state lawmakers.
